title: Computer completely crashes playing league about 10 mins in
body:
It never happened before last week, I replaced my fan in my computer because I originally thought that was the issue, and my one fan under the gpu(I think, its the biggest fan) stopped working again! Usually I can turn my pc back on and reconnect and not have the issue but It crashed twice in the same game and now I left my team with a loss, going into my 10th low priority queue since this started.. I tried downloading DOTA today and it happened with that as well! No other games do this to my computer. And ill play xenoverse black ops 3 Dark Souls 3, South park and a lot of other games...... so what should I do? I don't want to quit because ive put a lot of money into LoL but its not worth me buying a new computer completely, please help, I'm sick of low priorities. I changed the fan and it stopped for a while but the fan just stopped working altogether again so I opened up the side of my tower and put a fan to the side of it and made sure it would be a lot colder. Pls help {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: There may be a serious hardware or driver problem if your computer is shutting down mid-game, which usually happens as a security precaution.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look at this individually with you, and grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to it.  We'll help figure out what's going on!
